languages.text: {n}На лице нападающего не дергается ни один мускул. Его неподвижный взгляд вперен в лицо дворянина.{/n} "Играйте в свои игры сколько угодно. Моя миссия не изменится. Эта сволочь будет мертва".
{n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице нападающего не дергается ни один мускул. Его неподвижный взгляд вперен в лицо дворянина.{/n} "Играйте в свои игры сколько угодно. Моя миссия не изменится. Эта сволочь будет мертва".

traits.locale_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change. The scoundrel will die."

{n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

languages.text: {n}Im Gesicht des Angreifers zuckt kein einziger Muskel. Sein unerbittlicher Blick fixiert den Adligen.{/n} "Spielt Eure Spielchen ruhig weiter. Meine Mission bleibt dieselbe: Der Schurke wird sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Im Gesicht des Angreifers zuckt kein einziger Muskel. Sein unerbittlicher Blick fixiert den Adligen.{/n} "Spielt Eure Spielchen ruhig weiter. Meine Mission bleibt dieselbe: Der Schurke wird sterben."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de l'assaillant reste totalement impassible. Son regard implacable est braqué sur le noble.{/n} « Livrez-vous à vos petits jeux, si cela vous chante. Ma mission reste la même : ce scélérat va mourir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de l'assaillant reste totalement impassible. Son regard implacable est braqué sur le noble.{/n} « Livrez-vous à vos petits jeux, si cela vous chante. Ma mission reste la même : ce scélérat va mourir. »

languages.text: {n}袭击者的脸上没有一丝抽搐，他的目光死死地盯着眼前的贵族。{/n}“你想怎么狩猎都可以，但我的使命不会改变，这个人渣必须死。”
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}袭击者的脸上没有一丝抽搐，他的目光死死地盯着眼前的贵族。{/n}“你想怎么狩猎都可以，但我的使命不会改变，这个人渣必须死。”

languages.text: {n}El atacante no mueve ni un músculo de su rostro. Su mirada implacable no se aparta del noble.{/n} «Haced lo que queráis. Mi misión es la misma: este rufián debe morir».
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}El atacante no mueve ni un músculo de su rostro. Su mirada implacable no se aparta del noble.{/n} «Haced lo que queráis. Mi misión es la misma: este rufián debe morir».

languages.text: {n}襲撃者の顔の筋肉は1ミリも動かない。その冷徹な視線は貴族に注がれていた。{/n}「好きに足掻くがいい。俺の使命は変わらない。あの悪党は死ぬ」
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}襲撃者の顔の筋肉は1ミリも動かない。その冷徹な視線は貴族に注がれていた。{/n}「好きに足掻くがいい。俺の使命は変わらない。あの悪党は死ぬ」

languages.text: {n}Saldırganın yüzünde tek bir mimik kıpırdamıyor, amansız bakışları soyluya çakılı tutuyor.{/n} "Ne oyuna kalkışırsan kalkış... Vazifem değişmez: O soysuz ölecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Not one muscle twitches on the attacker's face. His relentless gaze is fixed upon the nobleman.{/n} "Play your games all you want. My mission will not change: the scoundrel will die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saldırganın yüzünde tek bir mimik kıpırdamaz, amansız bakışları soyluya çakılıdır.{/n} "Ne oyuna kalkışırsan kalkış, vazifem değişmez: O soysuz ölecek."
